name: B.O.U.S.E
description:
B.O.U.S.E (Battle Of Us Shooting Ennemies) is one of the most incredible shooter of all time !

 Will you be the man who save the world ? Use the most awesome weapons to beat the villains whos want to destroy the world !

The best shooter of all time, released in 2010 and winner of the JeuxDeMerde award the same year, comes back with new ultraHD binoral sound 3D effects, 89K ultra HD graphics and astonishing soundtrack

By the way, this game is not an adaptation. It IZ the matrix of all further adaptations. Like Call of Duty.
